#summary List of useful open-source projects for easier Django development on App Engine.
#labels Featured

 * [http://www.bitbucket.org/jeverling/django-registration_appenginepatch/ django-registration] - user registration for Django with app-engine-patch
 * [http://github.com/woid/firepython/tree/master FirePython] - log directly to Firebug
 * [http://code.google.com/p/gae-django-dbtemplates/ gae-django-dbtemplates] - render templates from the datastore
